Question
========
A researcher wants to know if workers score better in test B than in
test A. For this purpose, she draws a random sample of 10 workers who
take both tests. The tests concern the same content and in each one of
them, the maximum score is 100 points.

workers score better in test B than in test A?

----------
* A test for a proportion
* A one-sample t-test for the mean

* A chi-squared test
